title: 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
recently, latest rust source getting error to build.

$ rustc -vV
rustc 1.41.0-dev
binary: rustc
commit-hash: unknown
commit-date: unknown
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.41.0-dev
LLVM version: 9.0
